thread.title: High school football: Lisle earns OT win against Herscher
thread.title_full: High school football: Lisle earns OT win against Herscher

title: High school football: Lisle earns OT win against Herscher
text:
High school football: Lisle earns OT win against Herscher Published: Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 1:07 a.m. CDT By SUBURBAN LIFE MEDIA 
LISLE â€“ Mark McGrath found a sliver of daylight along the right sideline. 
That was all he needed. 
Taking the direct snap, McGrath tucked the ball, ran toward the front right pylon of the end zone and plowed in for an overtime touchdown that sealed Lisle's 24-21 win against Herscher. 
It was the Lions fourth straight win and fifth overall, making them eligible for the playoffs. 
McGrath also had a touchdown pass to Nick Massura in the first quarter and a 27-yard scoring run the fourth quarter for Lisle (5-2 overall, 4-1 Interstate Eight Small). 
The Lions travel to Coal City on Oct. 16 for the first of two Interstate Eight Conference crossover games to close the season.
